title: Peanut Sauce
directions: For the dressing, heat the oil in a small pan and fry the shallot until starting to brown. Add the chilli powder and cook for one minute.
Stir in a splash of soy sauce, the garlic, sugar and ground peanuts. Stir well.
Add the coconut milk a little at a time. Bring to the boil and simmer gently for two minutes. Stir in the lemon juice and season to taste.
